facts: I am currently based in Ontario, Canada📌
My technical interests are Software Engineering, Software Development, AI/ML, and Web Development👨🏾‍💻
I am currently a student at Carleton University in my third-year🎓
Personally, I enjoy Working out, staying active, and anime!
biography:
"I am currently pursuing a major in Computer Science, specializing in Software Engineering. Professionally, I work as a Test Automation Intern (FSWEP) at IRCC🍁.

Throughout my degree, my primary focus has been on enhancing my ability in applying mathematical and computer science principles to develop and refine applications.➗ With a fervent passion for tackling complex challenges, I thrive as a "puzzle solver"🧩 applying my knowledge and experience to find, and ultimately create new solutions for software or as I see them "puzzles".

What truly distinguishes me is my unwavering enthusiasm for pushing my limits📈. As I progress in my Software Engineering journey, I am dedicated to evolving as a developer, driven by an insatiable curiosity and an unshakable commitment to mastering new technologies and techniques endlessly.✔️"
